channel.title: Virtue backup
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]This is not my work this is the work of scott perretta. Im releaseing this because he quit rsps so i guess i might aswell release It . Remember i haven't done anything to the source i just found it floating around on my desktop. this was released before a Long time ago . so why not just release it again since he stopped playing? come on we can improve this much more' since all the minigames are working perfectly.. ][/b][/size]
[size=8pt][b]Server Summary: The server Virtue, is going to be a server that outdoes any server that is currently online. I am making this server, to give players of this community, the best gaming experience they can possibly have, on a private server. This server will have so much to do, that even when maxed, they cannot get bored.
Our XP rate on this server is 20X runescape, which is the perfect amount to level up faster than runescape, while feeling a very good sense of accomplishment. The XP rate is designed to give you a small challenge, when maxing out your levels, and gives you a much harder challenge to reach that 200M marker.
This server will be advertised and hosted when finished, and while this is online, my goal is to make everyone, play a server they can have fun on![/b][/size]
[b]Virtue's Economy: After giving it alot of thought, people don't like that hard of an economy. The economy of Virtue will be very stable, and will involve alot of skilling/trading. Here is the basic format of what it is going to be.
You can buy base supplies from a shop (seeds for example). With those base supplies, you will have to make the herbs, which will then make the potions. This way, you just can't buy potions, which there is no sense of accomplishment in. This is less strict then my old one, which you would have to actually thieve the seeds, which for a server, is a bit extreme. But I do still want this economy, so there is a very stable market.[/b]
[b]Universal Skilling:
In Virtue, we will have something called universal skilling. Which basically means, instead of having a zone designed specifically for skilling, we will make it so you can skill anywhere on Virtue. That means you can roam to anywhere across Virtue, and chop down trees/ mine some rocks depending on the locations in RS.
What this allows a player to do, is get a good feel of real skilling rathe than easy, 5 minute skilling. This will add a level of difficulty when getting those 99's also![/b]
[b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b] Skills:
Melee - Completely Re-Done Combat System - All special attacks working completely and accuratly - PvP | PvM | NvN system rewrites
Magic - Modern/Ancient/Lunar Spellbooks Added - Lunar Spells/Modern Spells only have ones that work well with the server - Re-done combat system - All ancient spells work
Ranging - Re-done combat system - Bolt effects / Effect System - Bows/Arrows Working correctly
Prayer - Bones on Altar - Bury Bones
Mining - Rocks lose the ore after mining it - Prospecting - All rocks included
Smithing - Smelting Correctly Implemented - Bronze-Rune Armour smithing
Fishing - Net / Bait / Lure / Cage / Harpoon / Big Net (Sea Turtles and Rocktails) - Correct secondary item for fishing when needed
Cooking - Ability to cook all food that one can fish - Burning Formula that relates to the cooking level
Firemaking - Clipping to the walls - All logs can be burned - Customized Inferno Adze Quest
Woodcutting - All trees can be cut down - Formula for trees - all hatchets working with effect in forumla
Agility - Gnome Course - Barbarian Course
Herblore - All regular potions done - Extremes Makeable - 1 5 10 X All working - Overloads w/Effect
Thieving - Pick pocketing with failing - Stalls thievable - Not the main source of money in a server
Farming - All Herb Seeds / Watering / Raking
Crafting - Tanning - Leather / Hard Leather - All Dragonhide
Fletching look in media
Slayer - Slayer Tasks/ Shop - Much better system, (70-150 per task) - Slayer Tower
Runecrafting - All altars - Tiara activating - Multiple Runes
Hunter - Butterfly's - Imps (Not much to hunter)
Summoning - Look In Media
Dungeoneering - 5 Floors - 4 Complexities for Each Floor - All dungeoneering items/Armour bindable - A Boss per Floor (With Special (Custom)) - 120 Dungeoneering Max Level, with Formula - Formula for dungeoneerng XP - Tokens received is 10 times less than xp received. - Working Tab Interface - Leave/Abandon Working on Logout/DC/On Command - Shop rewards in tokens are nothing more than regular shop rewards (no primal OP stuff) [b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b] Minigames / Bosses:
Godwars - All 4 Bosses - 30 KC requirement - Bosses with minions and effects
Corp Beast - Different Types of Attacks - 2k HP, 65 mage max hit, 50 melee max hit
Tormented Demons - Prayers For Player - Multi Attacks
Dagonnoth Kings - All 3 with effects - Magic Creatures on Sides - Correct Maps To Get There
Nex (Donor Only) - 5 Stages - 4 Minions - Correct Dialogue, and Special Effects
Barrows - All 6 Brothers - Tunnel - Correct Chest loots - Tunnel Rocks at end
Fight Caves - 63 Wave Fight Cave
Fight Pits - Working fight pits w/Tokkul reward - Cool free for all minigame
Pest Control - Basic NPC spawning - All 4 Portals - Void Rewards
Duel Arena - Working dueling 100% - No Dupes/Bugs Etc....
Minigames / Bosses:
[b][Barrows Media][/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ctnK_usEZg
[b][Godwars][/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XExlxWKq7cY
[b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[b]Summoning Media[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWQKthEpcxc http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IwMth3xtQZo
Check the rest of the pic's out yourself ingame . im really tired of copying
[b]package[/b] * Notice'. The cache auto download's itself from a direct link.

item.dc:creator: @dyates73 dyates73
item.description:
@dyates73 wrote:

There are no virus. and it was released before just made a backup of it because the owner took it down for some reason .
is it wrong to share it with people who might improve it alot more. if not then please dont say shit like that . it was the owner’s fault for releasing this and taking it down again i have allready given him all the credit’s

and there is no virus inside it obviously you havent downloaded this and just saying that because its not my work .

Read full topic

item.title: Virtue backup
item.dc:creator: @dyates73 dyates73
item.description:
@dyates73 wrote:

Dude i know this isn’t mine to release but the owner had it released once or twice . and then he stopped it but it’s hes own fault for doing that so. why not allow the rest of the world to use it when there are around 1000 other people using it .
This can be improved much much more because it has all the minigames working 100% and all the skills are working perfectly aswell . this is a great base it’s the owner’s fault for releasing this once and then he should have known if he deleted it people would make backup of it because it’s such a good base and all that .

Read full topic

Im releaseing this because he quit rsps so i guess i might aswell release It . Remember i haven’t done anything to the source i just found it floating around on my desktop. this was released before a Long time ago . so why not just release it again since he stopped playing? come on we can improve this much more’ since all the minigames are working perfectly… ][/size]

[size=8pt][b]Server Summary:
The server Virtue, is going to be a server that outdoes any server that is currently online. I am making this server, to give players of this community, the best gaming experience they can possibly have, on a private server. This server will have so much to do, that even when maxed, they cannot get bored.

Our XP rate on this server is 20X runescape, which is the perfect amount to level up faster than runescape, while feeling a very good sense of accomplishment. The XP rate is designed to give you a small challenge, when maxing out your levels, and gives you a much harder challenge to reach that 200M marker.

This server will be advertised and hosted when finished, and while this is online, my goal is to make everyone, play a server they can have fun on![/b][/size]

[b]Virtue’s Economy:
After giving it alot of thought, people don’t like that hard of an economy. The economy of Virtue will be very stable, and will involve alot of skilling/trading. Here is the basic format of what it is going to be.

You can buy base supplies from a shop (seeds for example). With those base supplies, you will have to make the herbs, which will then make the potions. This way, you just can’t buy potions, which there is no sense of accomplishment in. This is less strict then my old one, which you would have to actually thieve the seeds, which for a server, is a bit extreme. But I do still want this economy, so there is a very stable market.[/b]

[b]Universal Skilling:

In Virtue, we will have something called universal skilling. Which basically means, instead of having a zone designed specifically for skilling, we will make it so you can skill anywhere on Virtue. That means you can roam to anywhere across Virtue, and chop down trees/ mine some rocks depending on the locations in RS.

What this allows a player to do, is get a good feel of real skilling rathe than easy, 5 minute skilling. This will add a level of difficulty when getting those 99’s also![/b]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Skills:

Melee

  • Completely Re-Done Combat System
  • All special attacks working completely and accuratly
  • PvP | PvM | NvN system rewrites

  • Modern/Ancient/Lunar Spellbooks Added
  • Lunar Spells/Modern Spells only have ones that work well with the server
  • Re-done combat system
  • All ancient spells work

  • Re-done combat system
  • Bolt effects / Effect System
  • Bows/Arrows Working correctly

Prayer

  • Bones on Altar
  • Bury Bones

  • Prospecting
  • All rocks included

  • Smelting Correctly Implemented
  • Bronze-Rune Armour smithing

  • Correct secondary item for fishing when needed

Cooking

  • Burning Formula that relates to the cooking level

Firemaking

  • Clipping to the walls
  • All logs can be burned
  • Customized Inferno Adze Quest

Woodcutting

  • Formula for trees
  • all hatchets working with effect in forumla

  • Barbarian Course

  • Extremes Makeable

  • Overloads w/Effect

  • Not the main source of money in a server

Farming

Crafting

  • Leather / Hard Leather
  • All Dragonhide

Fletching
look in media

Slayer

  • Slayer Tasks/ Shop
  • Much better system, (70-150 per task)
  • Slayer Tower

Runecrafting

  • All altars
  • Tiara activating
  • Multiple Runes

Hunter

  • Butterfly’s
  • Imps (Not much to hunter)

Summoning

  • Look In Media

Dungeoneering

  • 5 Floors

  • All dungeoneering items/Armour bindable
  • A Boss per Floor (With Special (Custom))
  • 120 Dungeoneering Max Level, with Formula
  • Formula for dungeoneerng XP
  • Tokens received is 10 times less than xp received.
  • Working Tab Interface
  • Leave/Abandon Working on Logout/DC/On Command
  • Shop rewards in tokens are nothing more than regular shop rewards (no primal OP stuff)
    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    Minigames / Bosses:

Godwars
